name: Stick Fight The Battle
description:
Play as a Stick Fighter your duty is to save the princess from the evil ninja, your main character has mastered shuriken skill, solve the puzzle by throw the shuriken to break the cage that imprison the princess.

How to play:

– Touch screen to throw shuriken.
– Use obstacle as your advantage to kill the evil ninja.
– Purchase items in the shop will help a lot.
